ComicInfo.Title: Fox Hunt, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Foot Clan headquarters is under attack and no one is safe as brother turns against brother!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dave Wachter | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Damian Couceiro | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 3 | RE | IDW Convention Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Freddie Williams II (a) | 4 | RE | San Diego Comic Art Gallery Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Freddie Williams II (a) | 5 | RE | Eastman Fun Club Edition Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 6 |
